# This file is code-generated and any manual changes will be overwritten.
#
# Generated by src/religion_codegen.py
################################################################################

# Needs to be code-generated because it's used by traits at startup, before flags can be set
emf_religion_has_castes = {
	custom_tooltip = {
		text = RELIGION_HAS_CASTES
		OR = {
			religion = catholic
			religion = cathar
			religion = fraticelli
			religion = waldensian

# These massive triggers are unavoidable because PREVPREVPREV does not work as a left-side scope

true_religion_is_heresy_of_FROM_true_religion = {
	FROM = {
		NOT = { true_religion = PREV } # Skips the rest of the check if same true religion anyway
		trigger_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = catholic }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = catholic } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = cathar }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = cathar } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = fraticelli }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = fraticelli } } }

			limit = { true_religion = waldensian }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = waldensian } } }

true_religion_is_heresy_of_ROOT_true_religion = {
	ROOT = {
		NOT = { true_religion = PREV } # Skips the rest of the check if same true religion anyway
		trigger_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = catholic }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = catholic } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = cathar }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = cathar } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = fraticelli }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = fraticelli } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = waldensian }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = waldensian } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = lollard }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = lollard } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = adoptionist }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = adoptionist } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = arian }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = arian } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = orthodox }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = orthodox } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = bogomilist }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = bogomilist } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = monothelite }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = monothelite } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = iconoclast }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = iconoclast } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = syriac }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = syriac } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = maronite }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = maronite } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = miaphysite }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = miaphysite } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = monophysite }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = monophysite } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = apostolic }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = apostolic } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = paulician }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = paulician } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = tondrakian }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = tondrakian } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = nestorian }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = nestorian } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = messalian }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = messalian } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = sunni }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = sunni } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = zikri }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = zikri } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = mahdiyya }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = mahdiyya } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = nabawiyya }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = nabawiyya } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = ibadi }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = ibadi } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = kharijite }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = kharijite } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = haruri }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = haruri } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = shiite }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = shiite } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = waqifi }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = waqifi } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = zaydi }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = zaydi } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = hurufi }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = hurufi } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = ismaili }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = ismaili } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = druze }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = druze } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = qarmatian }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = qarmatian } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = norse_pagan_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = norse_pagan_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = norse_pagan }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = norse_pagan } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = tengri_pagan_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = tengri_pagan_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = tengri_pagan }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = tengri_pagan } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = baltic_pagan_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = baltic_pagan_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = baltic_pagan }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = baltic_pagan } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = finnish_pagan_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = finnish_pagan_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = finnish_pagan }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = finnish_pagan } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = aztec_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = aztec_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = aztec }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = aztec } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = slavic_pagan_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = slavic_pagan_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = slavic_pagan }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = slavic_pagan } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = west_african_pagan_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = west_african_pagan_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = west_african_pagan }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = west_african_pagan } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = zun_pagan_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = zun_pagan_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = zun_pagan }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = zun_pagan } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = hellenic_pagan_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = hellenic_pagan_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = hellenic_pagan }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = hellenic_pagan } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = bon_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = bon_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = bon }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = bon } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = zoroastrian }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = zoroastrian } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = mazdaki }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = mazdaki } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = zurvanist }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = zurvanist } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = manichean }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = manichean } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = mandaean }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = mandaean } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = yazidi }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = yazidi } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = khurmazta }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = khurmazta } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = jewish }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = jewish } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = samaritan }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = samaritan } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = karaite }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = karaite } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = hindu }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = hindu } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = buddhist }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = buddhist } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = jain }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = jain } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = taoist }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = taoist } } }
		}
	}
}

true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV_true_religion = {
	PREV = {
		NOT = { true_religion = PREV } # Skips the rest of the check if same true religion anyway
		trigger_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = catholic }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = catholic } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = cathar }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = cathar } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = fraticelli }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = fraticelli } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = waldensian }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = waldensian } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = lollard }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = lollard } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = adoptionist }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = adoptionist } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = arian }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = arian } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = orthodox }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = orthodox } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = bogomilist }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = bogomilist } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = monothelite }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = monothelite } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = iconoclast }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = iconoclast } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = syriac }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = syriac } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = maronite }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = maronite } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = miaphysite }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = miaphysite } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = monophysite }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = monophysite } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = apostolic }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = apostolic } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = paulician }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = paulician } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = tondrakian }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = tondrakian } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = nestorian }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = nestorian } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = messalian }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = messalian } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = sunni }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = sunni } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = zikri }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = zikri } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = mahdiyya }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = mahdiyya } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = nabawiyya }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = nabawiyya } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = ibadi }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = ibadi } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = kharijite }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = kharijite } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = haruri }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = haruri } } }
		}

			limit = { true_religion = shiite }

		}

			limit = { true_religion = waqifi }

		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = druze }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = druze } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = qarmatian }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = qarmatian } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = norse_pagan_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = norse_pagan_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = norse_pagan }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = norse_pagan } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = tengri_pagan_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = tengri_pagan_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = tengri_pagan }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = tengri_pagan } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = baltic_pagan_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = baltic_pagan_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = baltic_pagan }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = baltic_pagan } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = finnish_pagan_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = finnish_pagan_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = finnish_pagan }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = finnish_pagan } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = aztec_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = aztec_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = aztec }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = aztec } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = slavic_pagan_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = slavic_pagan_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = slavic_pagan }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = slavic_pagan } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = west_african_pagan_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = west_african_pagan_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = west_african_pagan }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = west_african_pagan } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = zun_pagan_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = zun_pagan_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = zun_pagan }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = zun_pagan } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = hellenic_pagan_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = hellenic_pagan_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = hellenic_pagan }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = hellenic_pagan } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = bon_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = bon_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = bon }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = bon } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = zoroastrian }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = zoroastrian } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = mazdaki }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = mazdaki } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = zurvanist }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = zurvanist } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = manichean }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = manichean } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = mandaean }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = mandaean } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = yazidi }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = yazidi } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = khurmazta }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = khurmazta } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = jewish }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = jewish } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = samaritan }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = samaritan } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = karaite }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = karaite } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = hindu }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = hindu } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = buddhist }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = buddhist } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = jain }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = jain } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = taoist }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = taoist } } }
		}
	}
}

true_religion_is_heresy_of_target_ruler_true_religion = {
	event_target:target_ruler = {
		NOT = { true_religion = PREV } # Skips the rest of the check if same true religion anyway
		trigger_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = catholic }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = catholic } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = cathar }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = cathar } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = fraticelli }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = fraticelli } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = waldensian }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = waldensian } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = lollard }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = lollard } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = adoptionist }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = adoptionist } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = arian }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = arian } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = orthodox }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = orthodox } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = bogomilist }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = bogomilist } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = monothelite }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = monothelite } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = iconoclast }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = iconoclast } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = syriac }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = syriac } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = maronite }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = maronite } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = miaphysite }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = miaphysite } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = monophysite }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = monophysite } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = apostolic }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = apostolic } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = paulician }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = paulician } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = tondrakian }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = tondrakian } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = nestorian }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = nestorian } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = messalian }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = messalian } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = sunni }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = sunni } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = zikri }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = zikri } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = mahdiyya }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = mahdiyya } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = nabawiyya }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = nabawiyya } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = ibadi }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = ibadi } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = kharijite }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = kharijite } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = haruri }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = haruri } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = shiite }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = shiite } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = waqifi }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = waqifi } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = zaydi }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = zaydi } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = hurufi }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = hurufi } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = ismaili }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = ismaili } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = druze }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = druze } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = qarmatian }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = qarmatian } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = norse_pagan_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = norse_pagan_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = norse_pagan }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = norse_pagan } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = tengri_pagan_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = tengri_pagan_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = tengri_pagan }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = tengri_pagan } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = baltic_pagan_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = baltic_pagan_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = baltic_pagan }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = baltic_pagan } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = finnish_pagan_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = finnish_pagan_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = finnish_pagan }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = finnish_pagan } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = aztec_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = aztec_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = aztec }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = aztec } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = slavic_pagan_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = slavic_pagan_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = slavic_pagan }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = slavic_pagan } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = west_african_pagan_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = west_african_pagan_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = west_african_pagan }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = west_african_pagan } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = zun_pagan_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = zun_pagan_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = zun_pagan }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = zun_pagan } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = hellenic_pagan_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = hellenic_pagan_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = hellenic_pagan }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = hellenic_pagan } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = bon_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = bon_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = bon }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = bon } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = zoroastrian }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = zoroastrian } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = mazdaki }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = mazdaki } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = zurvanist }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = zurvanist } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = manichean }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = manichean } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = mandaean }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = mandaean } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = yazidi }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = yazidi } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = khurmazta }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = khurmazta } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = jewish }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = jewish } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = samaritan }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = samaritan } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = karaite }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = karaite } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = hindu }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = hindu } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = buddhist }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = buddhist } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = jain }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = jain } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = taoist }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_heresy_of = taoist } } }
		}
	}
}

# These massive triggers are unavoidable because PREVPREVPREV does not work as a left-side scope

true_religion_is_parent_religion_FROM_true_religion = {
	FROM = {
		NOT = { true_religion = PREV } # Skips the rest of the check if same true religion anyway
		trigger_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = catholic }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = catholic } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = cathar }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = cathar } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = fraticelli }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = fraticelli } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = waldensian }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = waldensian } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = lollard }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = lollard } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = adoptionist }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = adoptionist } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = arian }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = arian } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = orthodox }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = orthodox } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = bogomilist }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = bogomilist } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = monothelite }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = monothelite } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = iconoclast }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = iconoclast } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = syriac }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = syriac } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = maronite }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = maronite } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = miaphysite }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = miaphysite } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = monophysite }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = monophysite } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = apostolic }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = apostolic } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = paulician }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = paulician } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = tondrakian }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = tondrakian } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = nestorian }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = nestorian } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = messalian }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = messalian } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = sunni }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = sunni } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = zikri }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = zikri } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = mahdiyya }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = mahdiyya } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = nabawiyya }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = nabawiyya } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = ibadi }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = ibadi } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = kharijite }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = kharijite } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = haruri }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = haruri } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = shiite }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = shiite } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = waqifi }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = waqifi } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = zaydi }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = zaydi } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = hurufi }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = hurufi } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = ismaili }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = ismaili } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = druze }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = druze } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = qarmatian }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = qarmatian } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = norse_pagan_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = norse_pagan_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = norse_pagan }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = norse_pagan } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = tengri_pagan_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = tengri_pagan_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = tengri_pagan }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = tengri_pagan } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = baltic_pagan_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = baltic_pagan_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = baltic_pagan }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = baltic_pagan } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = finnish_pagan_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = finnish_pagan_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = finnish_pagan }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = finnish_pagan } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = aztec_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = aztec_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = aztec }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = aztec } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = slavic_pagan_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = slavic_pagan_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = slavic_pagan }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = slavic_pagan } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = west_african_pagan_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = west_african_pagan_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = west_african_pagan }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = west_african_pagan } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = zun_pagan_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = zun_pagan_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = zun_pagan }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = zun_pagan } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = hellenic_pagan_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = hellenic_pagan_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = hellenic_pagan }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = hellenic_pagan } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = bon_reformed }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = bon_reformed } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = bon }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = bon } } }
		}

			limit = { true_religion = zoroastrian }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = zoroastrian } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = mazdaki }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = mazdaki } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = zurvanist }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = zurvanist } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = manichean }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = manichean } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = mandaean }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = mandaean } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = yazidi }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = yazidi } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = khurmazta }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = khurmazta } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = jewish }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = jewish } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = samaritan }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = samaritan } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = karaite }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = karaite } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = hindu }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = hindu } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = buddhist }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = buddhist } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = jain }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = jain } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = taoist }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = taoist } } }
		}
	}
}

true_religion_is_parent_religion_ROOT_true_religion = {
	ROOT = {
		NOT = { true_religion = PREV } # Skips the rest of the check if same true religion anyway
		trigger_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = catholic }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = catholic } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = cathar }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = cathar } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = fraticelli }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = fraticelli } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = waldensian }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = waldensian } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = lollard }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = lollard } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = adoptionist }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = adoptionist } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = arian }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = arian } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = orthodox }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = orthodox } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = bogomilist }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = bogomilist } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = monothelite }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = monothelite } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = iconoclast }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = iconoclast } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = syriac }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = syriac } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = maronite }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = maronite } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = miaphysite }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = miaphysite } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = monophysite }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = monophysite } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = apostolic }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = apostolic } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = paulician }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = paulician } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = tondrakian }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = tondrakian } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = nestorian }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = nestorian } } }
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = { true_religion = messalian }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = messalian } } }

			limit = { true_religion = zikri }

			limit = { true_religion = mahdiyya }
			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = mahdiyya } } }

			limit = { true_religion = nabawiyya }

			limit = { true_religion = qarmatian }

			PREV = { true_religion_scope = { persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = { is_parent_religion = norse_pagan_reformed } } }
